application.name: Yandex Media Player
application.description: Media player for Yandex stations. With additional station management capabilities.

color.label: Color of some interface elements
color.helper: The color of the volume setting and the progress bar. You can customize these colors in your profile.

devices.label: Choose Device
devices.helper: Devices that the media player will control. The equalizers of these devices will be connected automatically.

media.no_name: The media track has no name
media.demo_media_title: The name of your most favorite song

tooltip.say_track_name: Say the name of the track or don't
